note.p: Farmer. Bailiff at Claytons, Ashurst, Kent, 1841. Bailiff to the earl of Sheffield at Sheffield Farm, Fletching, Sussex, 1851; steward of the earl’s estates, 1861, 1871. Farmed 327 acres at Filstone Hall Farm, Shoreham, Kent, 1881, 1891; hop planter and farmer, 1901.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 February 2021)
Surrey Church of England parish registers (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 February 2021)
